name: Construction Way
description:
Inspired by the "Mini Motorways" game.

You have to connect houses to buildings in order for the cars to recieve loads from them, but you have limited roads, and more houses and buildings will be spawning randomly. Pay attention to the buildings as they will be increasing their amount of loads. If the amount of loads gets to 10 on any building your game will end. For each level you have to get a minimum of 2 stars in order to access the next level. It has 5 levels.

WARNING: The game contains major bugs at the moment but it is playable with some patience (don't panic if the cars go out the road at first) and luck.
